name: ChikungunyaVirusDiseaseTestsForChikungunyaVirusAntibodyQuantitative
title: Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya Virus Antibody [Quantitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Chikungunya antibody (quantitative results).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chikungunya),(Exclusion Criteria: - Interpretation tests, panel tests
- All other Arboviral conditions)
